Hab nrwm teb kuj lem moog rua saab nub poob moog txug Anau Thanpau, dhau hov ntawd moog txug Huko, mas saab qaab teb yog koom Xenpuloo nrwm teb hab saab nub poob koom Asaw nrwm teb, hab saab nub tuaj yog tug dej Yalatee kws npuas Yuta.
Puab tej moos kws muaj ntsaa loog yog tej nuav, Xinti, Xaw, Hama, Lakha, Khinele,
Antama, Lama, Haxau,
Khente, Ente‑i, Eehaxau,
Yiloo, Mintaa‑ee, Haulee, Npe‑anav hab Npeseme, huvsw muaj kaum cuaj lub moos hab tej zej zog ib ncig.
Nuav yog xeem Nathali hab puab cov quas cum le qub txeeg qub teg, yog tej moos hab tej zej zog ib ncig cov moos hov.
Rhu daim ntawv kws xyaa lug mas yog xeem Ntaaj hab puab cov quas cum le.
Tej tebchaws kws yog puab qub txeeg qub teg muaj tej moos nuav nyob huv yog Xaula, Etha‑oo, Iseme,
Sa‑aalanpi, Aiyaloo, Ibla,
Eloo, Thinaj, Ekhoo,
Eethekhe, Kinpethoo, Npa‑alab,
Yehuj, Npenenpela, Kalimoo,
hab Meyakhoo hab Lakhoo hab thaaj teb kws ncaaj lub moos Yaupa.

Thaus xeem Ntaaj lub tebchaws poob lawd, cov Ntaaj moog ua rog rua lub moos Lesee. Puab ntaus yeej hab xuas ntaaj tua lub moos hov hab txeeb tau ua puab tug hab moog nyob rua huv, mas puab muab lub moos Lesee hov hu ua Ntaaj lawv le puab tug yawm koob Ntaaj.
Nuav yog xeem Ntaaj hab puab cov quas cum le qub txeeg qub teg, yog tej moos hab tej zej zog ib ncig cov moos hov.
Thaus kws faib lub tebchaws ua qub txeeg qub teg txhua zog taag lawd cov Yixayee kuj muab qub txeeg qub teg huv puab faib rua Noo tug tub Yausua.
Lawv le Yawmsaub has mas puab muab lub moos kws nwg thov rua nwg, yog lub moos Thinaxela peg toj sab huv Efa‑i tebchaws. Yausua muab lub moos hov ua dua tshab hab moog nyob rua huv.

Tej kws has nuav yog pov thawj Ele‑axa hab Noo tug tub Yausua hab cov thawj huv txhua cum txhua xeem Yixayee muab ua ntawv rhu faib ua qub txeeg qub teg hov ntawm Silau taab meeg Yawmsaub xubndag ntawm qhov rooj lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb. Ua le nuav puab txhad muab lub tebchaws faib taag lawm.
Yawmsaub has rua Yausua tas,
“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Yuav tsum tu tej moos cawm sav kws kuv tub kuas Mauxe has rua koj lawd,
sub tug kws tua tuabneeg kws tsw yog txhob txwm tua hab tsw paub txhad tau tswv moog rua huv. Tej moos nuav yuav ua lub chaw rua mej cawm sav sub txhad dim tug kws tsob caub.

Tug kws tua tuabneeg hov yuav tswv moog rua cov moos hov ib lub hab moog sawv ntawm txujkev kws nkaag rua huv lub rooj loog hov hab pav nwg zaaj xwm txheej rua cov kev txwj quas laug huv lub moos hov paub. Mas puab yuav coj nwg nkaag moog rua huv lub moos hab tu chaw rua nwg nyob mas tug hov yuav nrug puab nyob.

Yog tug tsob caub lawv moog txug los cov kev txwj quas laug yuav tsw muab tug kws tua tuabneeg hov rua huv tug tsob caub txhais teg, tsua qhov tug kws tua tuabneeg hov tsw yog txhob txwm tua tsw tau ua dua yeeb ncuab le.

Tug hov yuav nyob huv lub moos hov moog txug thaus nwg moog sawv has plaub taab meeg ntawm cov pejxeem xubndag taag hab nyob txug thaus tug kws ua tuam pov thawj hlub lub swjhawm hov tuag lawm. Tug kws tua tuabneeg hov le rov moog tau rua nwg vaaj nwg tsev huv nwg lub moos kws nwg tswv tuaj.’ ”

Puab txhad tu lub moos Khente huv Kalilai kws yog peg toj sab huv Nathali tebchaws, hab lub moos Sekhee peg toj sab huv Efa‑i tebchaws, hab lub moos Khiliya Anpa (kws yog lub moos Heploo) kws nyob peg toj sab huv Yuta tebchaws.

Saab dej Yalatee nub tuaj kws ncaaj lub moos Yelikhau puab tu lub moos Npexaw huv tebchaws moj saab qhua kws nyob tej nraag taj toj sab huv xeem Lunpee tebchaws, hab lub moos Lamau huv Kile‑a huv xeem Kas tebchaws, hab lub moos Kaulaa huv Npasaa kws yog xeem Manaxe tebchaws.

Tej moos nuav yog tej kws tu ca rua cov Yixayee suavdawg hab lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug puab nyob, sub leejtwg tua tuabneeg tassws tsw yog txhob txwm tua txhad tau tswv moog rua huv, sub txhad tsw tuag rua tug tsob caub txhais teg ua ntej kws tsw tau moog sawv has plaub taab meeg cov pejxeem xubndag.
Thaus hov cov kws ua thawj huv xeem Levi txhua cum tuaj cuag pov thawj Ele‑axa hab Noo tug tub Yausua hab cov kws ua thawj huv txhua xeem txhua cum Yixayee,
mas has rua puab ntawm Silau huv Khana‑aa tebchaws tas, “Yawmsaub tub has rua Mauxe kuas muab tej lub moos rua peb nyob hab muab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig rua peb yug tsaj txhu.”
Ua le nuav cov Yixayee txhad le rhu puab qub txeeg qub teg tej lub moos kws yuav has nuav hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig cov moos hov pub rua cov Levi lawv le Yawmsaub has kuas puab ua.
Rhu tau ntawv lug yog Khauha cov quas cum. Ua le nuav cov Levi kws yog pov thawj Aloo caaj ceg txhad tau kaum peb lub moos kws rhu huv xeem Yuta hab xeem Xime‑oo hab xeem Npeeyamee lug.
Cov Khauha kws tseed tshuav rhu ntawv tau kaum lub moos huv xeem Efa‑i cov quas cum hab xeem Ntaaj hab ib nraab xeem Manaxe.
Cov Kwsoo rhu ntawv tau kaum peb lub moos huv xeem Ixakha cov quas cum hab huv xeem Asaw hab xeem Nathali hab ib nraab xeem Manaxe huv Npasaa tebchaws.
Melali cov quas cum tau kaum ob lub moos huv xeem Lunpee hab xeem Kas hab xeem Xenpuloo.
Tej moos hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig nuav cov Yixayee ua ntawv rhu pub rua cov Levi lawv le kws Yawmsaub kuas Mauxe has rua puab lawd.
Puab muab tej moos kws yuav has nuav huv xeem Yuta hab xeem Xime‑oo
pub rua Aloo caaj ceg kws yog ib cum huv cov Khauha kws yog xeem Levi, tsua qhov puab tub rhu tau thawj daim ntawv lawm.
Puab muab lub moos Khiliya Anpa (Anpa yog Anaj txwv), kws yog lub moos Heploo kws nyob peg toj sab huv Yuta tebchaws, hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig lub moos hov.
Tassws tej teb hab tej zej zog kws nyob ib ncig lub moos mas tub muab rua Yefune tug tub Khalej yuav ua nwg tug lawm.

Puab muab lub moos Heploo hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig rua pov thawj Aloo caaj ceg. Heploo yog ib lub moos cawm sav rua tug kws tua tuabneeg. Hab puab muab tej moos nuav hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig cov moos nuav, yog lub moos Lina,
hab Yathi, Ethemau‑a,
Hauloo, Ntenpi,
Ayi, Yutha hab Npeseme, huvsw yog cuaj lub moos huv ob xeem nuav.
Huv xeem Npeeyamee yog muab tej moos nuav hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig, yog Kinpe‑oo, Kenpa,
Anathau hab Amoos, huvsw yog plaub lub moos.
Aloo caaj ceg kws ua pov thawj tej moos huvsw muaj kaum peb lub moos hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig.
Cov Khauha kws tseed tshuav kws yog Khauha cov quas cum huv xeem Levi, puab rhu ntawv tau tej moos huv xeem Efa‑i.

Tej moos kws puab muab yog lub moos Sekhee hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig, kws yog ib lub moos cawm sav rua tug kws tua tuabneeg, kws nyob peg toj sab Efa‑i tebchaws, hab tej moos nuav hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig, yog Kexaw,
Kixa‑i hab Npe Hauloo, huvsw yog plaub lub moos.
Huv xeem Ntaaj yog muab tej moos nuav hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig, yog Eethekhe, Kinpethoo,
Aiyaloo hab Kalimoo, huvsw yog plaub lub moos.
Huv ib nraab xeem Manaxe yog muab lub moos Tha‑ana hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig, hab Kalimoo hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig, huvsw yog ob lub moos.
Khauha cov quas cum kws tseed tshuav hov tej moos mas huvsw yog kaum lub moos hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig.

Tej lub moos kws muab rua Kwsoo caaj ceg kws yog ib cum huv xeem Levi, mas huv ib nraab xeem Manaxe yog muab lub moos Kaulaa huv Npasaa hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig, kws yog ib lub moos cawm sav rua tug kws tua tuabneeg, hab lub moos Npe‑ethela hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig, huvsw yog ob lub moos.
Huv xeem Ixakha yog muab tej moos nuav hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig, yog Khisi‑oo, Ntanpela,
Yamu hab Eekani, huvsw yog plaub lub moos.
Huv xeem Asaw yog muab tej moos nuav hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig, yog Misaa, Antoo,
Heekha hab Lehau, huvsw yog plaub lub moos.

Huv xeem Nathali yog muab lub moos Khente huv Kalilai, kws yog ib lub moos cawm sav rua tug kws tua tuabneeg, hab lub moos Hamauntau hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig, hab Khathaa hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig, huvsw yog peb lub moos.
Kwsoo cov quas cum tej moos mas huvsw muaj kaum peb lub moos hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig.
Tej moos kws muab rua cov Levi kws tseed tshuav, yog Melali cov quas cum, mas huv xeem Xenpuloo yog muab tej moos nuav hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig, yog Yaune‑aa, Khatha,
Ntinas hab Nahalaa, huvsw yog plaub lub moos.
Huv xeem Lunpee yog muab tej moos nuav hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig, yog Npexaw, Yahaj,
Khentemau hab Mefa‑a, huvsw plaub lub moos.
Huv xeem Kas yog muab lub moos Lamau huv Kile‑a hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig, kws yog ib lub moos cawm sav rua tug kws tua tuabneeg, hab muab tej moos nuav hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig, yog Mahana‑i,
Hesanpoo hab Yaxaw, huvsw yog plaub lub moos.
Tej moos kws muab rua cov Levi kws tseed tshuav, yog Melali cov quas cum, mas huvsw yog kaum ob lub moos.
Levi tej moos kws nyob huv cov Yixayee lub tebchaws kws yog puab teej puab tug huvsw yog plaub caug yim lub moos hab tej tshaav zaub ib ncig.
Tej moos nuav puavleej muaj tshaav zaub vej puag ncig txhua lub moos ib yaam nkaus.

Lawv le kws has lug nuav Yawmsaub muab lub tebchaws kws Yawmsaub tau cog lug tseg tas yuav pub rua puab tej laug huvsw pub rua cov Yixayee. Thaus puab txeeb tau ua puab tug lawd puab ca le moog nyob hlo ruaj rua huv.

Yawmsaub pub puab nyob ruaj nyob tug tau su rua txhua faab, yaam le kws Yawmsaub tau cog lug tseg rua puab tej laug. Tsw muaj ib tug yeeb ncuab tiv tau puab le, tsua qhov Yawmsaub tub muab puab tej yeeb ncuab rua huv puab txhais teg huvsw lawm.
Txhua yaam zoo kws Yawmsaub tau cog lug tseg rua cov Yixayee tsw tshuav ib yaam daabtsw kws tsw tau tav, puavleej tav taag huvsw lawm.
Thaus ntawd Yausua hu xeem Lunpee hab xeem Kas hab ib nraab xeem Manaxe tuaj
mas has rua puab tas, “Mej tub ua lawv le Yawmsaub tug tub qhe Mauxe has rua mej lawm hab mej noog kuv lug hab ua txhua yaam kws kuv has kuas mej ua.
Ntev lug txug naj nub nwgnuav mej tsw tso mej cov kwvtij tseg, mej tub ceev faaj ua lawv le kws Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv has rua mej.

Nwgnuav Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tub pub mej cov kwvtij tau su lawm, lawv le nwg tau cog lug tseg rua puab. Tes mej ca le rov qaab moog tsev huv lub tebchaws kws Yawmsaub tug tub qhe Mauxe muab pub rua mej ua mej teej mej tug saab dej Yalatee nub tuaj.

Mej yuav tsum ceev faaj ua lawv le tej lug nkaw hab txuj kevcai kws Yawmsaub tug tub qhe Mauxe has rua mej lawd. Mej yuav hlub Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv hab ua mej lub neej lawv le nwg txhua txujkev huvsw, hab tuav rawv nwg tej lug nkaw hab nrug nwg tsheej xeeb, hab ua koom rua nwg kawg mej lub sab lub ntsws.”
Yausua txhad foom koob moov rua puab hab xaa puab moog tes puab txawm rov moog puab vaaj puab tsev.

Ib nraab xeem Manaxe hov, Mauxe tub muab Npasaa tebchaws rua puab yuav ua puab tug, tshuav ib nraab xeem hov mas Yausua pub puab nrug puab cov kwvtij tau teej tug saab dej Yalatee nub poob. Thaus Yausua xaa puab moog tsev nwg foom koob moov rua puab,

hab has rua puab tas, “Ca le rov qaab moog nyag vaaj nyag tsev, coj tej cuab txhaj cuab taam muaj nplua quas mag, tej nam paab tsaj tej nyaj hab tej kub tej tooj lab tej hlau hab tej tsoog tsho ntau ntau moog. Muab tej kws mej txeeb yeeb ncuab le lug hov faib rua mej cov kwvtij neej tsaa.”

Cov Lunpee hab cov Kas hab ib nraab xeem Manaxe tau ncaim cov Yixayee ntawm Silau huv Khana‑aa tebchaws rov qaab moog tsev rua huv Kile‑a tebchaws, yog lub tebchaws kws puab txeeb tau ua puab tug lawv le Yawmsaub kuas Mauxe has rua puab lawd.

Thaus puab lug txug ntawm ntug dej Yalatee kws nyob Khana‑aa saab tebchaws, cov Lunpee hab cov Kas hab ib nraab xeem Manaxe txawm tib ib lub thaaj xyeem rua ntawm dej Yalatee, yog ib lub thaaj kws luj kawg le.
Mas cov Yixayee nov luas has tas, “Saib maj, cov Lunpee hab cov Kas hab ib nraab xeem Manaxe ua tau ib lub thaaj rua ntawm Khana‑aa nrwm teb kws ze ntug dej Yalatee saab kws yog Yixayee tebchaws.”
Mas thaus cov Yixayee tau nov le hov ib tsoom pejxeem Yixayee suavdawg txawm sau zog ua ke rua ntawm Silau yuav moog ua rog rua puab.
Mas cov Yixayee txhad khaiv pov thawj Ele‑axa tug tub Fineha moog cuag cov Lunpee hab cov Kas hab ib nraab xeem Manaxe huv Kile‑a tebchaws,
hab kaum tug kws ua hlub, ib xeem ib tug kws puavleej yog tug thawj huv txhua cum Yixayee nrug nwg moog.
Thaus puab tuaj txug cov Lunpee hab cov Kas hab ib nraab xeem Manaxe huv Kile‑a tebchaws puab kuj has rua cov hov tas,

“Yawmsaub cov tuabneeg suavdawg has le nuav tas, ‘Mej ua daabtsw le nuav? Mej faav xeeb rua cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv, es nub nua mej tso Yawmsaub tseg moog ua ib lub thaaj rua mej xwb, yog nub nua mej tau sawv twv Yawmsaub lawm.

Tej kev txhum kws peb ua ntawm Pe‑au tseed tsw txaus hab lov? Lug txug naj nub nwgnuav peb tseed ntxuav tsw tau kuas peb huv huv le hab tej kev txhum hov ua kuas vej sub vej sw poob rua Yawmsaub cov tuabneeg xwb.
Mas nub nua mej tseed yuav tso Yawmsaub tseg hab lov? Nub nua yog mej sawv twv Yawmsaub mas pigkig nwg yuav chim rua ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg.

Yog mej lub tebchaws qas tsw huv mej ca le hlaa moog rua huv Yawmsaub lub tebchaws kws muaj Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub, lug nrug peb tuav lub tebchaws ua teej ua tug. Tsw xob sawv twv Yawmsaub hab tsw xob coj peb twv Yawmsaub es moog ua ib lub thaaj rua mej kws tsw yog peb tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub lub thaaj.

Xelag tug tub Akhaa tub ua tsw ncaaj rua tej kws muab cais pub rua Yawmsaub los tsw yog? Mas Yawmsaub txujkev chim txhad le poob rua sau cov Yixayee suavdawg. Tsw yog nwg tuab leeg puam tsuaj rua nwg lub txem xwb.’ ”
Xeem Lunpee hab xeem Kas hab ib nraab xeem Manaxe txawm teb cov thawj huv txhua cum Yixayee tas,

“Tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus pum, yog Vaajtswv kws yog Yawmsaub. Tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus pum, yog Vaajtswv kws yog Yawmsaub ntaag. Nwg yeej paub hab ca cov Yixayee paub hab. Yog tas peb sawv twv hab ua tsw ncaaj rua Yawmsaub mas nub nua tsw xob tseg peb txujsa le.

Qhov kws peb ua lub thaaj hov, mas yog peb tso Yawmsaub tseg hab swv ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem hab ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo rua sau lub thaaj hov, mas ca Yawmsaub rau txem ntaag.
Tsw yog le hov. Qhov kws peb ua le hov tub yog ntshai tsaam tuab maav mej tej tub ki yuav has rua peb tej tub ki tas, ‘Mej muaj feem koom Yawmsaub kws yog cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv daabtsw?

Tsua qhov Yawmsaub tub muab tug dej Yalatee ua nrwm teb quas peb hab mej cov Lunpee hab cov Kas lawm nev. Mej tsw muaj feem huv Yawmsaub.’ Yog le hov peb ntshai tsaam mej tej tub ki yuav ua rua peb tej tub ki tseg tsw pe hawm Yawmsaub.
Vem le nuav peb txhad has tas, ‘Ca peb ua lub thaaj nuav, tsw yog ua lug swv ua tej kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem lossws tua tsaj xyeem.’

Tassws yog peb ua lug ua tsoob zeej timkhawv rua peb hab mej, hab rua lwm tam kws dua peb lawm tas peb yeej yuav pe hawm Yawmsaub hab ua tej kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem hab tua tsaj xyeem hab xyeem sws raug zoo rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag,  sub mej tej tub ki txhad has tsw tau rua peb tej tub ki tom qaab tas, ‘Mej tsw muaj feem huv Yawmsaub.’

Peb xaav tas yog muaj leejtwg has le nuav rua peb lossws has rua peb caaj ceg tom qaab, peb kuj yuav has tau tas, ‘Saib lub thaaj nuav kws zoo yaam le Yawmsaub lub thaaj kws peb tej laug ua ca, tsw yog ua lug swv ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem lossws tua tsaj xyeem, tassws yog ua lug ua tsoob zeej timkhawv rua peb hab mej xwb.’

Peb yeej tsw yog yuav sawv twv Yawmsaub tso Yawmsaub tseg nub nua es ua dua ib lub thaaj lug ua tej kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem hab xyeem qoob loos hab tua tsaj xyeem, kws tsw yog peb tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub lub thaaj kws nyob ntawm Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub.”
Thaus pov thawj Fineha hab cov ua hlub kws yog cov thawj huv txhua cum Yixayee kws nrug nwg nyob ua ke hov nov tej lug kws cov Lunpee hab cov Kas hab cov Manaxe has hov mas puab kuj txaus sab heev.

Pov thawj Ele‑axa tug tub Fineha has rua cov Lunpee hab cov Kas hab cov Manaxe tas, “Nub nua peb paub tseeb tas Yawmsaub nyob huv plawv peb, vem yog mej kuj tsw faav xeeb rua Yawmsaub. Nwgnuav mej tau paab cov Yixayee dim qhov kws Yawmsaub rau txem.”
Pov thawj Ele‑axa tug tub Fineha hab cov kws ua hlub kuj tawm ntawm cov Lunpee hab cov Kas huv Kile‑a tebchaws rov qaab moog cuag cov Yixayee huv Khana‑aa tebchaws hab qha puab paub.

Tej lug kws puab moog qha hov txaus cov Yixayee sab hab cov Yixayee kuj qhuas Vaajtswv. Tsw muaj leejtwg yuav has txug ua rog rua puab hab ua rua lub tebchaws kws cov Lunpee hab cov Kas nyob lawd puam tsuaj le lawm.
Cov Lunpee hab cov Kas hu lub thaaj hov tas “Lub thaaj tsoob zeej timkhawv.” Puab has tas “Lub thaaj ua tsoob zeej timkhawv rua peb ob tog tas Yawmsaub yog Vaajtswv.”
Lug rua yaav tom qaab ntev loo thaus Yawmsaub pub cov Yixayee tau su tsw ua rog rua tej yeeb ncuab kws nyob ib ncig puab, hab Yausua noob nyoog nchaav hab laug heev lawm,
Yausua hu cov Yixayee suavdawg, yog cov kev txwj quas laug hab cov thawj, cov kws tu plaub hab cov num tswv suavdawg tuaj hab has rua puab tas, “Kuv noob nyoog nchaav hab laug heev lawm.
Mej tub pum txhua yaam kws Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tau ua rua tej haiv tuabneeg nuav huvsw vem yog saib rua mej, tsua qhov Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tau ua rog paab mej.

Saib maj, tej tebchaws kws tseed tshuav kuv tub muab faib ua qub txeeg qub teg rua mej cov quas xeem, ua ke rua tej tebchaws kws kuv tub kov yeej lawd, txwj ntawm tug dej Yalatee moog txug Havtxwv Luj  saab nub poob.

Mej tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub yuav muab puab thawb kuas tswv ntawm mej hauv ntej moog hab yuav ntab puab tswv dhau plhawv ntawm mej lub qhov muag moog. Mas mej yuav txeeb tau puab lub tebchaws ua mej tug lawv le mej tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub cog lug rua mej.
Vem le nuav mej ca le ua khov kho tuav rawv hab ua lawv nraim le txhua yaam kws sau ca rua huv Mauxe phoo kevcai, tsw xob tig rua saab xws lossws saab phem hlo le,

sub mej txhad tsw nrug tej haiv tuabneeg kws tshuav nyob huv plawv mej koom ua ke, lossws has txug puab tej daab lub npe hab tuav puab tej daab lub npe twv lossws ua koom rua hab pe puab tej daab hov.
Tassws mej yuav tsum nrug Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tsheej xeeb yaam le mej ua lug txug naj nub nwgnuav.
Tsua qhov Yawmsaub ntab tej haiv tuabneeg kws luj hab muaj zug dua mej tswv ntawm mej hauv ntej moog. Hab tsw muaj leejtwg tiv tau mej lug txug naj nub nwgnuav.
Mej ib leeg lawv tau ib txheeb leej tswv, vem mej tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub paab mej ua rog, lawv le nwg cog lug ca lawd.
Yog le nuav mej yuav tsum ceev faaj tuab zoo hlub Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
Yog mej tig rov qaab es moog koom tej haiv tuabneeg kws tseed tshuav nyob rua huv mej nuav, moog nrug puab ua tshoob ua kug, hab moog yuav puab tej tub tej ntxhais,

tes mej ca le paub tseeb tas, mej tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub yuav tsw ntab tej haiv tuabneeg hov tswv ntawm mej hauv ntej moog lawm. Puab yuav ua rooj ntxab rooj hlua cuab mej hab yuav ua raab nplawm nplawm mej nraus qaum hab ua xuav paug chob mej qhov muag moog txug thaus mej puam tsuaj taag huv lub tebchaws zoo nuav kws mej tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub pub rua mej lawm.

“Nwgnuav kuv saamswm yuav dua moog. Mej txhua tug lub sab hab tug ntsuj plig yeej paub tas txhua yaam zoo kws mej tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub cog lug rua mej tsw poob ib lus le, yeej ua tav txhua yaam tsw muaj ib yaam daabtsw kws tsw tau tav.

Txhua yaam zoo kws mej tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub cog lug rua mej tub ua tav rua mej le caag lawm, Yawmsaub yuav ua tej xwm txheej phem huvsw lug txug mej tav ib yaam le ntawd moog txug thaus nwg rhuav tshem mej pluj taag huv lub tebchaws zoo nuav kws mej tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub muab pub rua mej.

Yog mej faav xeeb rua mej tug Vaajtswv Yawmsaub tej lug cog tseg kws nwg muab cob rua mej es moog ua koom rua luas tej daab hab pe tej daab ntawd, mas Yawmsaub txujkev npau tawg yuav tshwm plawg rua mej mas mej yuav puam tsuaj sai kawg pluj taag huv lub tebchaws zoo kws nwg tau muab pub rua mej.”

Mas Yausua sau zog cov quas xeem Yixayee huvsw tuaj rua ntawm Sekhee, hab hu Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug hab cov thawj hab cov kws tu plaub hab cov num tswv tuaj, mas puab kuj tuaj rua ntawm Vaajtswv xubndag.

Mas Yausua has rua ib tsoom pejxeem suavdawg tas, “Yawmsaub kws yog cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv has le nuav tas, ‘Yaav thau u mej tej laug nyob ntawm ntug dej Yufeti saab nub tuaj, yog Thela kws yog Aplahaa hab Nahau txwv, puab yeej ua koom rua luas tej daab.
Mas kuv coj mej txwv Aplahaa tawm saab ntug dej Yufeti nub tuaj lug hab coj nwg lug thoob plhawv Khana‑aa tebchaws hab ua rua nwg muaj tub ki coob coob. Kuv pub Yiha rua nwg.
Kuv pub Yakhauj hab Exau rua Yiha. Kuv pub tej toj sab Xe‑i tebchaws rua Exau ua nwg tug, tassws Yakhauj hab nwg cov mivnyuas tau moog rua nraag Iyi tebchaws.
Kuv khaiv Mauxe hab Aloo lug hab kuv ua rua cov Iyi raug kev txom nyem vem tej kws kuv ua rua huv plawv puab. Hab yaav tom qaab kuv coj mej tawm lug.
Kuv coj mej tej laug tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug mas mej lug txug dej Havtxwv Lab. Cov Iyi tej tsheb ua rog hab tej tub rog caij neeg lawv mej tej laug lug txug dej Havtxwv Lab.

Thaus puab quaj thov Yawmsaub, mas nwg kuj ua kuas tsaus ntuj quas mej hab cov Iyi, hab nwg ua rua dej havtxwv nyaab hlo cov Iyi. Mej lub qhov muag yeej pum ntsoov tej kws kuv ua rua Iyi tebchaws. Hab mej nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua ntev.

“ ‘Mas kuv coj mej lug rua huv cov Amaulai lub tebchaws kws nyob saab ntug dej Yalatee nub tuaj. Puab ua rog rua mej mas kuv muab puab cob rua huv mej txhais teg hab mej txeeb tau puab lub tebchaws, hab kuv muab puab ua puam tsuaj taag rua ntawm mej hauv ntej.
Thaus ntawd Xipaula tug tub Npalaj kws ua vaajntxwv kaav Mau‑a sawv tseeg tawm tsaam cov Yixayee. Npalaj khaiv tuabneeg moog hu Npe‑au tug tub Npala‑aa tuaj tsawm foom mej.
Tassws kuv tsw quav ntsej Npala‑aa, vem le hov nwg txhad foom koob moov rua mej xwb. Yog le nuav kuv txhad le cawm mej dim huv nwg txhais teg.

Mej hlaa tug dej Yalatee lug rua ntawm lub moos Yelikhau, mas cov tuabneeg Yelikhau tawm tsaam mej. Cov Amaulai, cov Pelixai, cov Khana‑aa, cov Hivai, cov Kawkasi, cov Hivai hab cov Yenpu kuj tawm tsaam mej, tassws kuv muab puab cob rua huv mej txhais teg.
Kuv tso daiv tso nkawj ua mej ntej moog lawv cov Amaulai ob tug vaajntxwv tswv ntawm mej hauv ntej moog, tsw yog mej le ntaaj le neev ua tau.

Kuv muab lub tebchaws kws mej tsw tau khwv rua huv pub rua mej hab pub tej moos kws mej tsw tau tswm rua mej mas mej tau moog nyob rua huv. Mej tau noj tej vaaj txwv maab hab tej vaaj txwv aulib kws mej tsw tau cog.’

“Yog le nuav nwgnuav mej ca le paub ntshai hab fwm Yawmsaub hab ua koom rua nwg tuaj nruab sab tag tag moog le. Ca le muab tej daab kws mej tej laug txeev teev saab dej tim u hab huv Iyi tebchaws tso pov tseg hab ua koom rua Yawmsaub.

Yog mej tsw kaam ua koom rua Yawmsaub, nub nua mej ca le xaiv saib mej yuav ua koom rua tug twg, yuav ua koom rua tej daab kws mej tej laug txeev teev saab dej Yufeti tim u, lossws ua koom rua cov Amaulai tej daab huv lub tebchaws kws mej nyob nuav. Tassws kuv hab kuv tsev tuabneeg, peb yuav ua koom rua Yawmsaub.”
Cov pejxeem teb tas, “Qhov kws peb yuav tso Yawmsaub tseg es moog ua koom rua luas tej daab, thov kuas nyob deb ntawm peb,

tsua qhov Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv yog tug kws coj peb hab peb tej laug tawm huv Iyi tebchaws huv txujkev ua qhev lug, hab yog tug kws ua tej txujci phemfwj rua peb pum hab tsom kwm peb rua txhua txujkev kws peb taug hab tsom kwm peb rua huv txhua lub tebchaws kws peb hlaa moog.

Hab Yawmsaub ntab tej tuabneeg suavdawg tswv ntawm peb hauv ntej huvsw moog, yog cov Amaulai kws nyob huv lub tebchaws hov. Vem le nuav peb yuav ua koom rua Yawmsaub tsua qhov nwg yog peb tug Vaajtswv.”

Tassws Yausua has rua cov pejxeem tas, “Mej ua koom rua Yawmsaub tsw tau le, tsua qhov nwg yog tug Vaajtswv kws dawb huv. Nwg yog tug Vaajtswv kws khib xeeb nwg yuav tsw zaam mej tej kev faav xeeb hab mej lub txem.
Yog mej tso Yawmsaub tseg moog ua koom rua luas tej daab, nwg yuav tig hlo lug ua kev txom nyem ceblaaj raug mej hab rhuav tshem mej, txawm yog nwg txeev ua zoo rua mej kuj xwj.”
Cov pejxeem has rua Yausua tas, “Tsw yog le ntawd, peb yeej yuav ua koom rua Yawmsaub.”
Mas Yausua has rua cov pejxeem tas, “Mej ua timkhawv rov rua mej has tas mej xaiv yuav Yawmsaub hab ua koom rua nwg nav.” Puab has tas, “Peb ua tau timkhawv.”
Yausua has tas, “Yog le ntawd ca le muab luas tej txoov daab kws nyob huv mej pov tseg hab muab lub sab xwb rua Yawmsaub kws yog Yixayee tug Vaajtswv.”
Mas cov pejxeem has rua Yausua tas, “Peb yuav ua koom rua Yawmsaub kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv hab peb yuav noog nwg lug.”
Yog le nuav Yausua txhad kuas cov pejxeem cog lug tseg rua nub ntawd hab nwg muab tej kaab ke hab tej kevcai cob rua puab ntawm lub moos Sekhee.
Hab Yausua sau tej lug nuav rua huv Yawmsaub phoo ntawv kevcai. Nwg muab ib lub pob zeb luj teeb rua huv qaab tug ntoo qheb ntawm lub chaw pe hawm Yawmsaub.

Hab Yausua has rua cov pejxeem suavdawg tas, “Saib nawj, lub pob zeb nuav yuav ua timkhawv rua peb, tsua qhov lub pob zeb nuav tau nov tej lug huvsw kws Yawmsaub has rua peb. Yog tas mej faav xeeb rua mej tug Vaajtswv, lub pob zeb nuav txhad ua timkhawv kom mej.”
Tes Yausua txawm tso cov pejxeem nyag rov moog rua nyag thaaj tebchaws kws yog puab qub txeeg qub teg.
Dhau ntawd Noo tug tub Yausua kws yog Yawmsaub tug qhev txawm tuag, nwg noob nyoog muaj ib puas kaum xyoo.
Puab muab nwg log rua huv nwg thaaj teb kws yog nwg qub txeeg qub teg ntawm lub moos Thinaxela kws nyob peg toj sab Efa‑i tebchaws ntawm lub roob Ka‑a saab peg.
Cov Yixayee ua koom rua Yawmsaub taag Yausua swm neej hab taag cov kev txwj quas laug kws nyob ntev dhau Yausua swm neej hab paub txug txhua yaam kws Yawmsaub tau ua rua cov Yixayee.

Yauxej cov pob txhaa kws cov Yixayee coj huv Iyi tebchaws lug hov puab muab log rua huv lub moos Sekhee, yog huv thaaj teb kws Yakhauj yuav ntawm Hamau cov tub ib puas lub txag nyaj.  Hamau yog Sekhee txwv. Thaaj teb hov poob ua Yauxej caaj ceg le qub txeeg qub teg.
Aloo tug tub Ele‑axa kuj tuag, mas puab muab nwg log ntawm lub moos Kinpe‑a kws yog nwg tug tub Fineha lub moos kws tau muab ua Fineha teej tug yog nyob peg toj sab Efa‑i tebchaws.
